newsArray.title: Second Team Requests Interview with Steelers Offensive Coordinator Arthur Smith
creator: Alan Saunders, Steelers Now
newsArray.description: The Chicago Bears are the second team to request an interview with Pittsburgh Steelers offensive coordinator Arthur Smith for a head coaching vacancy.
